tidbits.title: Historical and Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: North Macedonia has a rich historical and cultural heritage, seen in ancient sites like Ohrid and its diverse ethnic and religious influences.

tidbits.title: Scenic Beauty
tidbits.description: The country offers scenic beauty, including Lake Ohrid, mountainous landscapes, and traditional villages, attracting nature enthusiasts.

tidbits.title: European Integration
tidbits.description: North Macedonia has been pursuing European integration, making strides in political and economic reforms to join the European Union.
